SEARCH
Package com.example.flashcardsystent.viewmodel

Class SummaryViewModel

java.lang.Object
androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
androidx.lifecycle.AndroidViewModel
com.example.flashcardsystent.viewmodel.SummaryViewModel
public class SummaryViewModel extends androidx.lifecycle.AndroidViewModel
ViewModel responsible for exposing quiz and classic learning statistics to the summary screen. Uses LiveData transformations to derive aggregate statistics from the database.
